org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util

Interface Slice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<SliceElement>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsensusCompactedSlice, NoConsensusCompactedSlice

    public interface Slice
extends Iterable<SliceElement>
    A Slice is a one base wide vertical cut of an assembly containing zero or more SliceElements.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsElement(String elementId)
      Does this Slice contain a SliceElement with the given id.
      Nucleotide getConsensusCall()
      Optional consensus of this slice.
      int getCoverageDepth()
      Get the coverage depth of this Slice.
      Map<Nucleotide,Integer> getNucleotideCounts()
      Get a Mapping of how many of each Nucleotide is present in this slice.
      SliceElement getSliceElement(String elementId)
      Get the SliceElement by id.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator

    • Method Detail

      • getCoverageDepth

        int getCoverageDepth()
        Get the coverage depth of this Slice.
        Returns:
        the coverage depth of this slice, will always be >= 0.

      • containsElement

        boolean containsElement(String elementId)
        Does this Slice contain a SliceElement with the given id.
        Parameters:
        elementId - the id of the SliceElement being queried.
        Returns:
        true if this Slice does contain a SliceElement with the given id; false otherwise.

      • getSliceElement

        SliceElement getSliceElement(String elementId)
        Get the SliceElement by id.
        Parameters:
        elementId - the id of the SliceElement to get.
        Returns:
        the SliceElement if exists; or null if there is no SliceElement for this Slice with that id.

      • getNucleotideCounts

        Map<Nucleotide,Integer> getNucleotideCounts()
        Get a Mapping of how many of each Nucleotide is present in this slice.
        Returns:
        a new Map containing just the Nucleotides counts for this slice if a Nucleotide is not present in this slice, then the Map will contain that key with a value of 0. If getCoverageDepth() ==0 then all the Nucletoides will have values of 0. Will never return null,

      • getConsensusCall

        Nucleotide getConsensusCall()
        Optional consensus of this slice. If present, this is what the consensus call of this Slice was previously called. If this Slice gets its consensus recalled using a ConsensusCaller then this value will NOT be changed. If the consensus for this slice is not available or does not exist yet, then this will return null.
        Returns:
        the Nucleotide consensus call for this slice if present, or null if the consensus is not available or does not exist.
